remarks: Introducing subtraction on both sides of a statement of inequality. Contrapositive of ~ subcan2d .  (Contributed by David Moews, 28-Feb-2017.)
statement:
negidd.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. CC ) $.
pncand.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. CC ) $.
subaddd.3 $e |- ( ph -> C e. CC ) $.
subneintr2d.4 $e |- ( ph -> A =/= B ) $.
subneintr2d $p |- ( ph -> ( A - C ) =/= ( B - C ) ) $.
